dmca.title: [Fwd: RE: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Remove Videodiary content: copyright infringement Black Eyed
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, December 07, 2005 3:42 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; adrost@brothersinart.net
Subject: [Fwd: RE: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Remove Videodiary content: copyright
infringement Black Eyed Peas]]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: RE: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Remove Videodiary content: copyright
infringement        Black Eyed Peas]
Date: Wed, 7 Dec 2005 22:12:29 +0100
From: Arno Drost <adrost@brothersinart.net>
To: The Planet Policy Enforcement <abuse@theplanet.com>,
<copyright@theplanet.com>, <arno@blackeyedpeas.com>
References: <4395EB11.2060203@theplanet.com>

Guys,

What's the status on this?
I need to know ASAP; if no response is giving within a few hours I will send
this to our lawyers in LA.
Please provide full address and fax details of your company.

We need to have the links and content removed from that site.

regards,
Arno Drost
The Black Eyed Peas
arno@blackeyedpeas.com


- -----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]
Sent: Tue 12/6/2005 8:48 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; arno@blackeyedpeas.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Remove Videodiary content: copyright infringement
Black Eyed Peas]

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Remove Videodiary content: copyright infringement
Black        Eyed Peas
Date: Tue, 6 Dec 2005 19:26:24 +0100
From: Arno Drost <arno@blackeyedpeas.com>
Reply-To: arno@blackeyedpeas.com
Organization: Black Eyed Peas
To: <legal@theplanet.com>,        <abuse@theplanet.com>

Dear Filipy Borghi Rodrigues de Souza / The Planet,



BEPBrazil.com / 70.84.222.50

Filipy Borghi Rodrigues de Souza

+55.1981385091

Rua Josefina Sarmento apto. 41

Campinas,  13025-260

BR



It has come to our attention that you are offering copyrighted material from
the Black Eyed Peas Videodiary as a download on bepbrazil.com. Please
consider this email an official notify that you will need to remove all BEP
Videodiary content from your website within 24 hours. We will check again in
24 hours, if you still have the clips of the Black Eyed Peas videodiary
online we will forward this case to our lawyers.



Best Regards,

Arno Drost

The Black Eyed Peas

http://www.blackeyedpeas.com <http://www.blackeyedpeas.com/>











- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org
